TopicTitle: How do you save / load a quick save?!?

Articles.Content: F5 to save, hold F9 to quickload Danger45
THANK YOU!!! Can you believe I've landed on 2 planets without knowing this?!? I was seriously about to stop playing. Thank Kod? for the forum!
Hehe, the demo and earlier KSP's never had such luxuries as saving and loading, or even persistence, so every flight was fraught with danger of messing up or having the game crash
